meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>freight</kanji> of <kanji>cash</kanji> comes in. What is a freight of cash? It's just <vocabulary>money</vocabulary>, <vocabulary>currency</vocabulary>, or <vocabulary>coinage</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
